description: This file contains an HTML document with embedded JavaScript that defines a Calculator class extending Service, registers methods, and initializes a ServiceManager to connect to a server, indicating it functions as a client-side script for a web-based service interaction.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A class extending Service that implements basic arithmetic operations (add and subtract) and registers these methods for remote invocation.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Performs addition of parameters and returns the sum as a promise.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Performs subtraction of parameters and returns the difference as a promise.
